Johanna Schielke is a student assistant at the Department of Information Management since November 2024. Currently she is studying Library and Information Science in combination with Art and Visual History at Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin. Previously she completed her Diploma in Painting / Printmaking at the Academy of Fine Arts Leipzig. 

[Profile](https://www.ibi.hu-berlin.de/de/institut/personen/schielke/dienst) \@hu-berlin.de
